price: ߊ߬ ߞߵߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߊ߬ ߝߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ ߦߋ߫ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߍ߲ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ ߦߋ߫ ߡߎ߲߬ ߓߊ߬ߕߏ߬ ߟߊ߫؟
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mā taʿbudūna
